title: Riot Hootington or Riot Prynce
body: Could you guys please give me a PM or comment. MY main account was hacked friday and my credit card got charged 200$ and I've already sent in tickets friday. I know that you two have helped me in the past. Please help! Thanks!

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend sitting tight until one of our account specialists can get back to you on it. Response times are a *bit longer* than normal due to a large volume of tickets submitted recently. We'll have a specialist with you as soon as possible, though.
____
Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. ^.^

I got a response last night and I've replied and  submitted all the info the specialist asked of me. But I still have not gotten any password reset email and the specialist I feel hasn't even bothered to check what responses to that ticket and the other tickets I've put in regarding the fact that my account got transferred to a different region and the 200$ that was charged to my credit card =(
